generated_description: platinium is a company based in paris, ile-de-france, specializing in cleaning and facility management. the company offers a wide range of products including hand sanitizers, disinfectants, masks, gloves, antibacterial soaps, and various hygiene and maintenance items such as toilet paper, tissues, hand towels, and cleaning equipment. platinium is committed to environmental sustainability, using ecolabel products and aiming for zero co2 emissions. the company also operates its own beehive in the high savoie region.
